blocks.content: After configuring mute timings on your notification policy, verify that everything is set up correctly. Even when mute timings are active, alerts continue to evaluate and appear in the Grafana UIâ€”only the notifications to contact points are suppressed.
Navigate to **Alerts & IRM > Alerting > Notification configuration**.
Locate your notification policy and verify that mute timings are listed.
Click the **Time intervals** tab to review your time interval configurations.
Click on each time interval name to view its configuration details. Verify the time ranges, days of the week, and other settings match your notification suppression requirements.
Navigate to **Alert rules** to view alert instances.
Check the alert instances to understand current alert status. Alert instances remain visible with their firing or pending status even during mute timing periods.
You've successfully configured a notification policy with mute timings. Alerts continue to evaluate normally, but notifications to contact points are suppressed during any of the mute timing windows.
